segments.name: Hiyouki
segments.text: I got fitted with new engines, w..what do you think?

segments.name: Me
segments.text: Aren't they the same as usual?

segments.name: Hiyouki
segments.text:
No!! Whole different set of engines! 
Much smaller.

segments.message: Hiyouki likes that you notice her

segments.name: Hiyouki
segments.text: Haha yeah! More energy efficient as well
